Interface JdkHttpClient

All Superinterfaces:
AutoCloseable, Closeable, HttpClient, LifeCycle<HttpClient>
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultJdkHttpClient
public interface JdkHttpClient extends HttpClient
Marker interface for HttpClient implementations that use the java.net.http.* HTTP Client.
Since:
4.0.0
Author:
Tim Yates
